item.title: Digi Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Digi Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsMarch 25, 2025Digi International Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Digi branded products and services only.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on March 5 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on March 5 Now AvailablenewsApril 1, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on March 5, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: FINAL REMINDER — Please Complete Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey” by April 4
item.description: FINAL REMINDER — Please Complete Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey” by April 4blogBy CVE Program|April 1, 2025The “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey,” which opened on March 4, 2025, will close at11:59 PM ET on April 4, 2025. If you are a consumer ofCVE Records, or a defender, theCVE Programwould like to hear from you about such topics as:Where do you get your CVE data from?How do you use CVE data?Do you store a copy of the CVE data?What data types (i.e., fields) are most important to you in a CVE Record?Are there data types that you’d like to see added to CVE Records in the future (e.g., purl)?To participate in the survey, please clickhere.

item.title: LAST CHANCE — Virtual Registration forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025Closes April 4
item.description: LAST CHANCE — Virtual Registration forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025Closes April 4blogBy CVE Program|April 1, 2025Registration for virtual attendance toCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025is open through April 4, 2025, on theFIRST conference website. Virtual admission registration is US $100.00. Discounted rates are not offered for this event regardless of membership or speaking status. This is your last chance, soregister today!

item.title: Thank You for Participating in Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey”
item.description: Thank You for Participating in Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey”newsApril 8, 2025TheCVE Programsincerely thanks everyone who responded to our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey” that opened on March 4, 2025, and closed on April 4, 2025. Your feedback will play a crucial role in enhancing the CVE Program and its service offerings.
